import axios from'axios';import Cookies from'js-cookie';const API_URL=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:4000',// Cambia esta URL a la de tu backend
withCredentials:true});API_URL.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=Cookies.get('token');if(token){config.headers['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>Promise.reject(error));export{API_URL};
